| History                 = The Seven Gates are a triad whom had a presence in NY City. Whose members tortured a former PLA general for information as to the location of a 30 ft statue of Buddha, made of gold that was brought to the United States by the Savage Tigers, the local branch of their rivals the [[White Lotus Society (Earth-616)|White Lotus Society]].<!-- {{r|Punisher Vol 2 51}} -->

They were taken to the warehouse that contained the statue, but the [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]] arrived with his allies the [[Royal Cobras (Earth-616)|Royal Cobras]]. In the battle that ensued, the members in New York were slaughtered.{{r|Punisher Vol 2 51}}
